              def authorize_edit
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # Managers can edit anyone, developers can only edit themselves
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
              2
            

            

                is_manager = @current_user_role == "manager"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              2
            

            

                is_self = @collaborator.user_id == Current.session&.user_id
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              2
            

            

                unless is_manager || is_self
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = "You are not authorized to perform this action."
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  redirect_to project_path(@project)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              end

              def authorize_update_or_destroy
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                # Allow invitation acceptance/decline (user acting on their own invitation)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              20
            

            

                if @collaborator.user_id == Current.session&.user_id
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              10
            

            

                  return
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                # Otherwise, only managers can update/destroy other collaborators
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              10
            

            

                unless @current_user_role == "manager"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              4
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = "You are not authorized to perform this action."
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              4
            

            

                  redirect_to projects_path
          
      162.

                def start_new_session_for(user)

                    Current.session = session

      11.

      21.

              def request_review
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

                unless @task.in_progress?
          
      43.

      45.

              def assign_to_me
          
      84.

      85.

      86.

      87.

              def handle_inline_edit
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                unless current_user_is_manager?
          
      104.

      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  return
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108.

                update_params = inline_edit_params
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                handle_assignee_status_change(update_params)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                if @task.update(update_params)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  render json: task_json_response
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113.

      114.

      115.

              def handle_standard_update
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
              19
            

            

                params_hash = params[:task] || {}
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
              19
            

            

                remove_media_file_ids = Array(params_hash[:remove_media_file_ids]).reject(&:blank?)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              19
            

            

                if remove_media_file_ids.any?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
              3
            

            

                  remove_media_file_ids.each do |attachment_id|
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
              3
            

            

                    attachment = ActiveStorage::Attachment.find_by(id: attachment_id)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
              3
            

            

                    if attachment && attachment.record == @task
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
              1
            

            

                      attachment.purge
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
              19
            

            

                update_params = task_params.except(:remove_media_file_ids, :media_files)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
              19
            

            

                new_media_files = params[:task][:media_files]&.reject(&:blank?)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              19
            

            

                update_successful = @task.update(update_params)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
              19
            

            

                if update_successful && new_media_files.present?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
              4
            

            

                  @task.media_files.attach(new_media_files)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              4
            

            

                  @task.validate
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              4
            

            

                  unless @task.errors.empty?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    update_successful = false
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              19
            

            

                if update_successful
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
              14
            

            

                  notice_message = if remove_media_file_ids.any?
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              3
            

            

                    "Media file removed."
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              11
            

            

                  elsif new_media_files.present?
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              4
            

            

                    "Media files uploaded."
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  else
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              7
            

            

                    "Task updated."
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              14
            

            

                  redirect_to project_task_path(@project, @task),
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                              notice: notice_message,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                              status: :see_other
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                else
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              5
            

            

                  error_message = @task.errors.full_messages.join(", ").presence || "Task could not be updated."
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              5
            

            

                  redirect_to project_task_path(@project, @task),
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                              alert: error_message,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                              status: :see_other
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162.

              def set_assignable_collaborators
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              46
            

            

                @collaborators = @project.collaborators.where.not(role: :manager).includes(:user)

    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175.

      176.

              def task_params
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              34
            

            

                params.require(:task).permit(
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  :title,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  :description,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  :status,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  :type,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  :branch_link,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  :assignee_id,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  :priority,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  :due_at,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  media_files: [],
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  remove_media_file_ids: []
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                )
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              1
            

            

              def set_status_based_on_assignee
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              15
            

            

                @task.status = @task.assignee_id.present? ? :in_progress : :todo
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195.

              def authorize_manager
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196.

                collaborator = Collaborator.find_by(user_id: Current.session&.user_id, project_id: @project.id)
          
      197.

              21
            

            

                unless collaborator&.manager?
          
      198.

                  flash[:alert] = "Only managers can create tasks."
          
      199.

                  redirect_to project_path(@project)

              def authorize_project_edit
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204.

                collaborator = Collaborator.find_by(user_id: Current.session&.user_id, project_id: @project.id)

                unless collaborator && collaborator.role != "invited"
          
      206.

      211.

              def current_user_is_manager?
          
      212.

              def contribution_percentage

                total_seconds = completed_tasks.sum { |task| task.completed_at - task.created_at }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              2
            

            

                avg_seconds = total_seconds / completed_tasks.count
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              2
            

            

                (avg_seconds / 1.day).round(1)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              1
            

            

              def on_time_completion_rate
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
              2
            

            

                tasks_with_due_date = assigned_tasks.completed.where.not(due_at: nil)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45.

                return nil if tasks_with_due_date.empty?
          
      46.

      47.

            class Task < ApplicationRecord

              def create_test_file(filename, content_type)

                  expect(task.errors[:title]).to be_present

    261. 
            

            

            
          
      262.

                context "when user is a manager" do
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              8
            

            

                  before { sign_in(manager) }
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              1
            

            

                  it "creates invitation with valid email and returns JSON success" do
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
              1
            

            

                    expect {
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
              1
            

            

                      post project_collaborators_path(project), params: { identifier: user_to_invite.email_address }
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                    }.to change(Collaborator, :count).by(1)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              1
            

            

                    expect(response).to have_http_status(:created)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              1
            

            

                    json_response = JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
              1
            

            

                    expect(json_response['success']).to be true
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
              1
            

            

                    expect(json_response['message']).to include(user_to_invite.username)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
              1
            

            

                  it "creates invitation with valid username and returns JSON success" do
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
              1
            

            

                    expect {
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
              1

      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279.

      280.

      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
              1
            

            

                    expect(response).to have_http_status(:created)
          
      282.

              1

      283.

      297.

              1

      306.

      307.

              1

      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  end
          
      309.

      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
              1
            

            

                  it "returns JSON error for already-invited user" do
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
              1
            

            

                    Collaborator.create!(user: user_to_invite, project: project, role: :invited)
          
      312.

                  get "/"

            end

    198.

    spec/requests/task_media_spec.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    108 relevant lines. 108 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1.

            require 'rails_helper'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

            RSpec.describe "Task Media", type: :request do
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              15
            

            

              let!(:user) { create(:user) }
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              15
            

            

              let!(:project) { create(:project) }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              15
            

            

              let!(:task) { create(:task, project: project) }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            

              def sign_in(user)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              14
            

            

                post "/session", params: { email_address: user.email_address, password: "password" }

                it "prevents accessing media from a task in a different project" do

              1
            

            

                  other_task.media_files.attach(create_test_image)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            

                  other_task.save!
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  # Try to access the other task's media via wrong project
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  # This should fail because other_task belongs to other_project, not project
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  # The set_task before_action should raise RecordNotFound
          
      214.

                  expect {
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215.

                it "prevents deleting media from a task in a different project" do
